explains: v. 召集，集合，开会；传唤

sentences.en: The UN had the foresight to convene a "world assembly on ageing" back in 1982, but that came and went.
sentences.cn: 联合国早在1982年就有远见地召开了“老龄化问题世界大会”，但后来还是不了了之。

sentences.en: The committee will convene at 11.30 next Thursday.
sentences.cn: 委员会将在下星期四上午11:30开会。

sentences.en: We'd convene probably at least every week.
sentences.cn: 可能会每个星期召集他们一次。
